name: Adam Grzelczyk
story: Born in Poland, Gustaw Zimniak joined the military at a young age to pursue his passion of serving his country. He has served on multiple tours overseas and steadily climbed the ranks due to his exceptional leadership skills and attention to detail. He enjoys reading books on military tactics and spends his free time honing his marksmanship skills. He is married with two children and hopes to one day retire and open his own shooting range.
